A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People complained that TFA was too much like the old movies\, now they’re complaining that this isn’t enough like the old movies. I thought this was a beautifully made movie that addresses Luke’s exile and solidified Rey as the new hope. Luke went out as a legend\, completing something that had never been seen before—we even got to see Yoda teach him one more lesson! This trilogy is moving away from the Skywalkers...maybe people don’t realize that. Hopefully after they see this movie they’ll get it and move on.
